{"id":427830470,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â year","timestamp":1607266071,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/427830470/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Concatenation of Consecutive Binary Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    int ans = 0;\n    int mod = 1e9+7;\n    void solve(int n){\n        stack<int> st;\n        while(n){\n            st.push(n%2 == 1);\n            n=n/2;\n        }\n        while(st.size()){\n            ans = 2*ans%mod;\n            if(st.top() == 1 ){\n                ans +=1;\n            }\n            st.pop();\n        }\n        \n    }\n    int concatenatedBinary(int n) {\n        \n        for(int i = 1;i<=n;i++){\n            solve(i);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"concatenation-of-consecutive-binary-numbers"}
